0010111000011110 1001101011011000 1 -> sum: 1100100011110111, cout: 0
0000010000101001 0011111110000010 1 -> sum: 0100001110101100, cout: 0

0111110001100010 0011011001001011 0 -> sum: 1011001010101101, cout: 0
1101110110101101 1110001001010001 1 -> sum: 1011111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
